articles.title: UN declares famine in Gaza; 2 people starve to death in 24 hours
articles.description: The UN has declared a famine in Gaza, with reports indicating that two Palestinians have died from starvation in the past 24 hours amidst ongoing Israeli attacks. Over half a million Palestinians are facing catastrophic famine conditions, but Israel's Foreign Ministry disputes these findings, attributing them to 'Hamas lies' [2].

articles.title: Suspect behind Nord Stream attacks served in Ukraine's army, Sky News understands
articles.description: Sky News reports that the suspect behind the Nord Stream attacks previously served in Ukraine's army [3].

articles.title: FBI raids home of John Bolton, former Trump adviser turned critic
articles.description: The FBI has raided the home of John Bolton, a former Trump advisor who has become critical of the former president [2, 3].
